00044 void BdkDalitzBase::setEfficiencyFunc(const BdkDalitzEff * f) 
00045 {

00047   _effFirstEval = kTRUE;

00049 
00052 Double_t BdkDalitzBase::efficiency(Double_t m12, Double_t m13) {
00053 
00054   // Print message about global efficiency function on first evaluation
00055   // Only if RooAbsPdf::verboseEval()
00056   if (_verboseEval) {
00057     if (_effFirstEval) {
00058       if (_efficiencyFunc) {
00059         cout << GetName()<<" uses this efficiency function:"<<endl;
00060         _efficiencyFunc->getParameters(RooArgSet())->Print("v");
00061       }
00062       else cout << GetName()<<" does not use an efficiency function."<<endl;
00063       _effFirstEval = kFALSE;
00064     }
00065   }
00066   
00067   if (0 != _efficiencyFunc) {    
00068     return _efficiencyFunc->evaluateAt(m12, m13);
00069   }
00070   return 1.0;
00071 }
